entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
